namelist.namelist_summary:
############################################################################### namelist_CVDP.xml
Description Namelist to calculate the major modes of climate variability based on the NCAR Climate Variability Dynamics Package (CVDP)
Authors Adam Phillips (NCAR, US - asphilli@ucar.edu) Clara Deser (NCAR, US - cdeser@ucar.edu)
Contributor Dominik Kunert (DLR, Germany - Dominik.Kunert@dlr.de)
Project EMBRACE
Reference Phillips, A. S. et al., EOS T. Am. Geophys. Un., 95, 453-455 (2014) http://webext.cgd.ucar.edu/Multi-Case/CVDP_ex/CMIP5-Historical/methodology.html
This namelist is part of the ESMValTool ###############################################################################

diag.model: OBS HadISST reanaly 1 1900 2005 @{OBSPATH}/Tier2/HadISST
ana4mips IFS-Cy31r2 Amon reanalysis 1984 2005 @{OBSPATH}/Tier1
OBS NCEP reanaly 1 1984 2005 @{OBSPATH}/Tier2/NCEP
obs4mips GPCP-SG L3 v2.2 1984 2005 @{OBSPATH}/Tier1
ESGF_CMIP5 CanESM2 output1 CCCma CanESM2 historical mon ocean Omon r1i1p1 latest 1900 2005 CMIP5_template
ESGF_CMIP5 CCSM4 output1 NCAR CCSM4 historical mon ocean Omon r2i1p1 latest 1900 2005 CMIP5_template
